website_summaries.verdict: This low-priced option stands out for its silent operation.
pros: With two heat settings and a built-in thermostat, this little heater is a reliable option for small rooms
Heats quickly on either heat settings and can complement an insufficient central heating system
cons: Some customers were underwhelmed by this unit's output

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and silent
customer_reviews.text: I hate hearing space heaters turn on and off all the time. This one is silent. I have a 8x20foot caboose and this is the primary heater for it. It keeps a nice steady temparature. I also like that it's low enough that I can keep it under the bed, so it's out of the way. Yes, I know that sounds sketchy, but it's a built-in wooden bed and the heater remains a foot away from the wood. You have to bake wood well over 400 degrees to start it on fire. You might possibly melt some synthetic cloths if you got them near this thing, but you're not going to start any fires with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sonntag

customer_reviews.title: Feels empty but gets the job done quietly
customer_reviews.text: I guess there's not much to an electric heater. You run power through a piece of metal and it heats up. Add switches and a case to keep you from touching hot or electric stuff and you're done. There is no fan which is a major plus as far as I'm concerned because it allows the unit to operate silently. It is only 1000 watts so good for taking the chill off without blowing circuit breakers. If you're looking for something to kick ass, you'll want a 1500 watt unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gross

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Heater
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome little heater. Instant heat as soon as you flip the switch, quiet, consistent temperature. Feels like its not going to do the job when you first take it out the box but dont be fooled, this is an awesome little heater!
customer_reviews.author: ILS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Heats my 12×20 room great. I have 3 windows. On really cold freezing days. I turn it to it's highest. Gets the job done. Cheaper than gas heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use in my travel trailer. When a description says it has a thermostat, I assume it means it will shut off when it reaches a certain temperature. Nope, this one doesn't (so part of the problem could have been my understanding of the use of that particular word). I'd wake up in the middle of the night sweating away and have to turn it off. Of course then I'd wake up later freezing. I was trying to get away from using the noisy furnace in the trailer. I ended up tossing this heater along the route of a trip I took earlier this year.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pervier

customer_reviews.title: great product, offers a lot of heat for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Have this heater under my desk in a very cold and leaky office, great product, offers a lot of heat for a small baseboard, totally silent because there is no fan, all convection.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Haber

customer_reviews.title: Warms fast, stays warm!
customer_reviews.text: Got this small conv heater to compliment my house heating system, sitting below the window it warms the room corner very nicely. I sleep much better since. Warms instantly and stays warm through the night. Only used on first position (500W) as the second one is too hot for me. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very lightweight heater. The size isn't too obstructing and the odd rattle sound you hear when you move it appears to be something built in from what I've read. We use ours to heat a part of our basement (1550 sqft) I'd imagine we'd need at least three to heat the whole thing but it does great for heating the portion of the basement we're hanging out in and thanks to the weight it's simple to move.
customer_reviews.author: J.M. Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy and safe space heater.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted and needed a baseboard type heater for an unheated enclosed porch area. Purchased a tower heater at a big box store and returned it since discovered a baseboard type would better suit my needs. Although the highest settings produce 1000 watts and say it will heat a 400 square foot space, am a little disappointed that it takes longer than the old one I was replacing takes to the the area. Probably not the products fault, but mine for not researching better. It does do the job, but takes longer than I expected or like.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Heats great!
customer_reviews.text: Unit does great in our unheated mud room. EDIT: After one year, back in for a 2nd! Mud room is 8x8x8, has 3 exterior walls and no other heat source... Setting on “1” with the temp dial at 4 o’clock worked for the entire last winter, expecting the same for this one. The shut-off feature when the unit is tipped - and oh yeah, it’s been tipped - works great.
customer_reviews.author: David O.

customer_reviews.title: Heats up well
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my RV to not run out of propane so quickly and it works really well for the space. It heats up and keeps the heat. It does take time to heat but not too much. It has a mini thermostat so once it gets to the setting it turns off an back on when it drops below that level selected. Also does not waste to much electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Yasidh

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with our Heat Waves
customer_reviews.text: We love our Heat Waves (2 of them). We bought them to use on our unheated porch, full of windows and glass. The heaters do a nice job of heating the space if it is not too cold outside. It has extended our time on the porch by several months and we have been able to eat meals on the porch and read / relax even in March. The Heat Waves were very reasonably priced, low and tidy looking and service was prompt - highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Warm and quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Our bedroom has been really cold at night. Our vent doesn’t put out enough heat. We have our new baby in his crib in our room so we needed some extra heat. This thing works amazingly! It warms the entire room and there isn’t any load noises you get from most heaters. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: This heater does a great job in a basement bedroom in my daughter's home. There is a wall heater in the room which we use during the daytime but at night it cycles on and off and was so noisy we couldn't sleep. I bought this for us for future visits and other guests and it worked very well! It's very quiet. I didn't notice any clicking at all as it heats. It gets hot of course so do be careful with young children if you use it around them.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heater
customer_reviews.text: This heater is amazing! I am using it to keep my travel trailer warm this winter and it is doing an excellent job! I'd highly recommend this heater to anyone who is looking for a very quiet heater that does a great job keeping you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Luke C.

customer_reviews.title: Set it and forget it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the first setting which is 500 watts. It is just right to make my office suite a bit warmer than the 69 degrees it was before. Now it is just right and comfortable in all three rooms. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen 777

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made, Easy To Use And Very Efficient
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have found this heater to be extremely effective in the small room we have it set up in, and we're only using it on the 500 Watt setting. Very well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: MrFreecam

customer_reviews.title: Quietly keeps the room warm
customer_reviews.text: This unit sits beneath my bedroom windows and helps keep the cold out. It doesn't make any noise and keeps the room nice and warm. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: texmln

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater for my porch
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to heat my porch. To keep my dog warm, to keep my Potatoes from freezing . I like this heater a lot. I am glad that I found it. Its so much better than the Tower Heater that I was using out there.
customer_reviews.author: Sporty_2252

customer_reviews.title: Baseboard heater solves our 24-year old problem!
customer_reviews.text: Great baseboard space heater. Put it in our master bath which is nortoriously cold in the winter. Completely solved that problem. Totally quiet with high and low settings so you can get the amount of warmth desired. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Foonman

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are right that it is low powered
customer_reviews.text: This is not very comfortable heat as attested to in the numerous reviews. The main complaint I have is that it does not have a thermostat to shut itself off. I am either too hot or too cold with this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Some one

customer_reviews.title: This is the heater to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Highly recommend this. the price is reasonable, and it heats a surprisingly large area. The design is such that it forms a convection effect that causes the heat to circulate throughout the room, and without the need of a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: works well- dad took it!
customer_reviews.text: works well. Came home & I found out my dad took it to work! time to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Zen

customer_reviews.title: Puts out heat...just not enough.
customer_reviews.text: This can't heat a small room, but it is nice to have by my feet.
customer_reviews.author: KWOO

customer_reviews.title: Great Low Wattage Heater
customer_reviews.text: Heats perfectly. Simple controls. I use the 500 watt setting on 'low' to heat small (8' X 10') room for over-wintering patio plants.
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for those areas lacking enough heat
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to place in bedrooms that weren't getting enough regulated heat. Temperature setting works well to supplement and heat bedrooms to a comfortable level. Only wish is that they were digital.
customer_reviews.author: eek

customer_reviews.title: Quiet product that keeps a comfy room on cool nights, but not so much on really cold nights.
customer_reviews.text: The product is decent on a cool night between 40 - 65 degrees and keeps the room pretty comfortable but on a really cold night 30 and below you're gonna need something with a fan and motor that can push the heat around. Also it's a very quiet product which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cromer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for supplemental heat
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a spare room that's about 10x11 and it's ok. It definitely takes the chill out, but it doesn't make it super warm. The room is heated by central heat, but is still chilly- this definitely helps, I just wish it worked a little better.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: What a bucket
customer_reviews.text: This product very cheaply made and overpriced and small in size. My oven throws more heat than this heating device I consider the price to be a complete rip off. Would highly recommend to avoid buying this so called heater.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene hastings

customer_reviews.title: The packing not great. I do not know if that is why ...
customer_reviews.text: The packing not great. I do not know if that is why makes noise like a loose piece but, is working good
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: it heats well
customer_reviews.text: My apt. heater broke down and I needed heat for our cold nights. this little heater does the job. the only thing I'm worried about is if my cat goes around it and gets burned.I hope hes smart enough to feel the heat and stays away from it. thank you to the seller for getting it to me fast. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Kosegi

customer_reviews.title: Good heat source
customer_reviews.text: Great supplemental heat for spot heating or keeping a small room 10x10 very toasty. It is very quite. But you need to be very carefull not to Drop it. Internal controls are plastic and break apart rendering it unusable and not fixable..
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Price

customer_reviews.title: Not much heat.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely to look at, and very quiet, but only felt heat in a radius of approximately 2 feet. Only disperses heat from the top, not the sides. It might be useful for a very small room, but not the 400 square feet in the description. I had to ship it back at my expense, and there was a restocking fee. They were prompt in reimbursing the remainder of the cost, but not for the postage which was half the cost of the unit. Unless your room is very small, this is not what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Diana H

customer_reviews.title: Great heater. Silent. worth the price
customer_reviews.text: One thing I love about this heater is it’s completely silent. I use it to maintain heat in the bedroom and as a light sleeper it’s fantastic. Struggles in a large room. Great for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Surfing38

customer_reviews.title: Not warm
customer_reviews.text: Did not put out enough heat to warm our small bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Green

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: very good but was to big for my camper van
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: The heater works very well and pretty fast. It does get a bit hot on top so might not work with little kids around.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but needs more durable knobs
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Best value I've come across in a portable base heater. Only issue is the plastic knobs cracked after only a few years of use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Santoro

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Had since September darn thing burned up started smoking almost caught the house on fire
customer_reviews.author: dakota

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my reception area in my office. It is always so cold in there. Even in the summer time. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Overn

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective small heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heater. No noise. Low profile, so I don't have to worry about it tipping over. Warms up the small room I have it in.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: I need to return product..I do not have 220..I have a house that is over 100yrs old..and I cannot use..where do I return!!!!??
customer_reviews.author: Josephine J Campos

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet. Will not be used for at least several months.
customer_reviews.text: Secondary heat source in winter months in a small den in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Viveiros

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, cheap convection strip in a nice case. Ttook almost two weeks to get it to me. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Low heat for small area
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 1 week of us. No physical appearance defect or visual reason why that I can see.🤷🏾‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: I need to return this.
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this in once and it threw a circuit breaker. I want to return it and receive a refund, please.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Arrived DOA with obviously loose unconnected parts.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived DOA with obviously loose unconnected parts. Ordered 2, and both were dead on arrival with blatantly obvious manufactures defects. Ordered from Home Depot and got Lasko name brand, arrived working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the control panel popped out of the frame... when I plugged it in no light... no heat. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Brown

customer_reviews.title: It heats fast.
customer_reviews.text: It is compact for my crawl space and will be using to keep it consistant temp during winter for pipes. Simple.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Good investment!
customer_reviews.text: Heating a 12x 9 space with lots of windows. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Skyr-lover!

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it works well. Has rattle inside that I assume is the tip over protection. Works great in my basement.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: Runs quiet and warms the area quickly
customer_reviews.text: Runs without any noise. It quickly heats the room. The safety features work well. The outer case is not hot to the touch. Extremely satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: LeRoy Lundgren

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It only feels hot when you have your face right above it. Not suitable for heating anything around it. Let alone an entire room.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Minha

customer_reviews.title: works  great
customer_reviews.text: warms the spot I needed it for easy to use fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: peter fix

customer_reviews.title: Heat producer
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a good amount of heat in a small area.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works really well.
customer_reviews.text: The ball confused me at first but I figured it was the safety feature when it might turn over.
customer_reviews.author: R Wemp

customer_reviews.title: heater
customer_reviews.text: works great, came in very good condition. you guys rock thank you so much, keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Cost Effective big room heater
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps keep the unfinished basement warm, quiet yet strong heater!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Low power
customer_reviews.text: The heater did not heat up my bedroom, but the seller was quick to respond to my request for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silent heat at low operating cost.
customer_reviews.text: Great heater. Warms my rv really fast and costs almost nothing to run.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Mc.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very simple device, which takes up ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple device, which takes up little space and has two settings to save electricity. Because it has no visible thermostat, one determines wanted temperature by trial and error, but it took only two tries in less than ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: gadfly32

customer_reviews.title: good unit
customer_reviews.text: This heater is exactly what I expected. I wanted a basic heater that is totally silent. The controls on this unit are simple with one button for power on, low, high, and a dial for temperature. I normally don't write reviews but the unit didn't rate well and I wanted people to know this unit is a great value. It might also do well connected to a high amp timer. I have been using this unit for a week and I will update if something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: robert gene cole

customer_reviews.title: Item was defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this heater in June of this year as a gift to be used in the basement of my friend's house. The weather turned nasty here so I helped him (he is handicapped) take it out of the box and set it up. We plugged it in and it did not work. We missed the return date allowed as the weather didn't necessitate its use until today. Contacting Amazon customer service (Claire) provided me a link to the company which didn't work. So as I'm stuck with this thing that doesn't work, I give it a 'One Star' rating. Zero stars here was not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Silent and wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great heater and great seller. The heater has settings for multiple different Comfort levels and is completely silent which was important to me because the fan-driven heaters offer too much background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Kalanikai

customer_reviews.title: Did not heat our bedroom at all
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even see how anyone could rate this highly. It. Does. Not. Heat. We have one bedroom in our apartment which is super cold. We hoped this would help — it dis not. The room is about 15 x 10. Seriously the next morning the room was still super cold. Waste. Ordered a lasko ceramic heater that we used to have that we loved. Sorry I ever got rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mama of Three

customer_reviews.title: This device works as described, most useful for smaller rooms, very quiet, no noise
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for use in a detached garage, intended to maintain temperature after bringing up heat to a working level with another larger expensive propane unit. It did that very well in this well insulated garage, 3-bay in size. Even on days just above freezing the two units maintained the temp in the low 50's , perfectly OK for working conditions. There is no noise so I could see applications in a room such as a cool bedroom or study and with 1,000 watts a 15 amp circuit should not be overloaded.
customer_reviews.author: John F. D..

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly! Big Solution for Small Heater!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this heater. Other reviewers seemed concerned about a rattle noise, heard it, not concerned, maybe it’s a balance thing? No matter, this baby cranks out heat perfectly warming our room. It does get hot under the heater, so would not leave it (or any heater) unattended. It’s in use for the coldest nights as a pre-warmer for the bedroom (14x18’).
customer_reviews.author: Claire W.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Warning! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This heater stopped working after 6 months. The manufacturer "WILL NOT" honor the 1 year warranty as stated in the manual. So, if it breaks and after the 30 days are up, this heater is a " TRASH CAN ITEM "!
customer_reviews.author: BradB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a small room
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted her room to be warmer than the rest of the house. This little heater does a perfect job of keeping her room comfortable. The thermostat keeps the temperature steady once you find the right spot. This is a 500/1000 watt heater, so on the high setting of 1000 watts, it won't melt your plugs or overheat your receptacles like the higher wattage units.
customer_reviews.author: H. Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Too basic for the pricel Needs more features.
customer_reviews.text: Theres no visible marking (just a raised bit) on the dial, so you have to have light right on it to see where it’s set. Nor are there any numbers so you can set it at a consistent number. It’s VERY basic, but it works. Not a good value, though.
customer_reviews.author: darwinslapdog

customer_reviews.title: Heating
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this heater for a couple days now. I just wanted to take the chill out of the bedroom I am sleeping in. I really like it. Bedroom is 12x15 and it raises the temp another 4-5 degrees from the rest of the house. So far am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Oszaczky

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat much
customer_reviews.text: Used to heat at 12x12 basement office in CT. Barely puts out any heat even when cranked on full... then it shuts itself off automatically after 10-15 minutes. Will probably throw in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: That Dude

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work ok
customer_reviews.text: I got two. Both make a noise when carried like something is loose inside . I cant see anything. Both tested and appear to work. Is this something normal?
customer_reviews.author: james tyler

customer_reviews.title: Performed well
customer_reviews.text: No issues after several weeks. This style of portable heater is not as safe for unattended operation as the radiator-style heaters. If some small bit of paper should fall on it, it could ignite and trigger a fire.
customer_reviews.author: David Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, warm, thermostat works
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to keep our bedroom warm since we live on a slab. This does the job. Turn it on an hour before bed, and it's warmed up the room so much we often turn it off before hitting the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: RenaissanceWoman

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: Allows me to kick up temperature in one room by about 10deg, and so whole house can be around 60 deg. No fan, 2 wattage settings, not sure how precise the thermostat is yet.
customer_reviews.author: John Stokes

customer_reviews.title: A little heat added to this heater.
customer_reviews.text: Nice low energy heater for small space. Vendor worked well when carrier destroyed the first unit ordered. Vendor easy to work with and very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Boing Boing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this heater. I use it to warm up a small room here and on low setting, it does a very good job. It sits nicely and out of the way along a base of a wall and quietly does its job.
customer_reviews.author: David Lohman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. It runs very quietly and puts out a warm blanket of air. I was using it in a shed, but now use it in my garage. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money...
customer_reviews.text: Used an hour and it died. : ( Sent back... no replacement wanted.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Warmth
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We have a very cold kitchen (No basement) & I needed a long heating unit & it has been working like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better
customer_reviews.text: This product heats the room very well, and it makes no sound at all. I consider this to be an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use. Doesn't put out a lot of heat which I knew from previous reviews. Good for small office or under the desk.
customer_reviews.author: JCT in Midland

customer_reviews.title: looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: On low watt setting it will heat a small bathroom and on the hi setting it can warm up a bedroom. The two heat settings make this versatile and its wattage settings are a little lower then other heaters. It throws adequate heat and comes with a thermostat control setting. Compact, looks nice. I was going to return it for the noisy rattle but was told that was the tip over switch. Heater works fine.
customer_reviews.author: JCJ

customer_reviews.title: STRONG ODOR
customer_reviews.text: There's a very strong odor coming from the heater when in use. Because the room is small, this odor is a problem so I will return the heater. With the 20% restocking fee plus return shipping, I won't get back half of what I paid for the heater.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Item works well. Arrived quickly. Will rate durability at a later time.
customer_reviews.author: DobieDogMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape and worked as it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Thibeault

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE !!! NOT SAFE !!! FIRE HAZARDS !!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherell E Hall

customer_reviews.title: Worked so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had this heater since August I brought it in preparation for the cold weather. I use the heater every morning and the only issue I've had was a knob breaking. This heater is actually great but it doesn't have a fan so it takes a while to move heat around.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for any apartment
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment house in New York City, on the top floor. I can always use a bit more heat than is usually sent up. This adds to my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Gilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Needs better temp control.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. I do have a problem with the 5 degree changes in temp setting. This, to me, is a big hard to adjust for comfort jump.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Mumma

product_meta.title: Heat Wave 1,000 Watt Convector Baseboard Heater, Black
product_meta.description: The Heat-Wave 1,000 Watt portable electric convector baseboard heater is perfect for supplemental heat in small rooms or for personal use. It has an adjustable thermostat control with 2 heat settings (low and high). The heater is also equipped with an internal tip-over safety switch (rattling when moving heater is normal!). If the heater tips over, power is cut off automatically. This heater also has thermal cut off protection that shuts the heater off if it overheats. Equipped with a polarized 2-prong plug. Intended for use on the floor or elevated location. Never plug heater into an extension cord or power strip. Heater is hot when in use. Keep combustible materials (furniture, pillows, bedding, papers, clothes, etc.) at least 3 feet from the front of the heater.
feature_bullets: 2 heat settings: low (500 watts) and high (1,000 watts)
Adjustable thermostat control for maximum comfort
Safety features include: thermal cut-off protection (shuts off heater if it overheats) and tip-over switch (NOTE: rattling sound is normal when moving item)
For small room and personal use, provides SUPPLEMENTAL heat up to 400 square feet
